links.title: Auto Zoom
links.tooltip: Adjust Time Range to Sample Log Events

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM ${log} WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1000;

options.content:
Run on meta node as admin user to fetch and pour log into sample table: `$log`
```
catlog | pglog                       # get local (metadb) today's log
catlog node-1 | pglog                # get certain node today's log
catlog node-1 '2022-03-20' | pglog   # get node-1's csvlog @ 2022-03-20
# pg12, 13, 14 have different csvlog schema, use pglog12, pglog13 instead
```

list.description: First log timestamp of this sample
list.label: TimeBegin
list.name: ts_begin

list.description: Last log timestamp of this sample
list.label: Time End
list.name: ts_end
